thread.title: Weekend in Paris.
thread.title_full: Weekend in Paris. - Review of Les Plumes Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ronniec902
title: Weekend in Paris.
text:
The hotel and staff are lovely and they couldn't do enough for us. they made us feel very welcome and this is a great location as it is two minutes from the Cadet metro. The only down side is there is very little hanging space and no where to store your clothes so you have to live out of a suitcase.
Room Tip: There is very little hanging space, travel light! See more room tips
